actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to change the name of the China Bluff Access Area being constructed by the Army Corps of Engineers as part of the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway near Warsaw in Sumter County, Alabama to the "S.W. Taylor Memorial Park".

summary.text: Names the China Bluff Access Area being constructed as part of the Tennessee Tombigbee Waterway in Alabama the "S.W. Taylor Memorial Park."

titles.title: A bill to change the name of the China Bluff Access Area being constructed by the Army Corps of Engineers as part of the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway near Warsaw in Sumter County, Alabama to the "S.W. Taylor Memorial Park".
